alert.note: Alert for Eastern Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 15 at 4:00AM AKDT until March 16 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Reduced visibilities to one half mile. * WHERE...Eastern Aleutians. * WHEN...Until 4 AM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northerly winds will continue along with widespread snow showers, contributing to periods of low visibility. Gusty winds will persist through at least late tonight, though snow shower coverage may gradually decrease beyond this evening. This will lead to an extended threat of blowing snow through midweek.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
